TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23Trunkselect cbp.collection_point_code, crc.description_03 from ca_booked_person cbp join ca_reference_character8 crc on cbp.collection_point_code = crc.reference_code where cbp.booking_reference = lower(safe_get_br_from_reference(regexp_replace(:public_reference, '([[:cntrl:]^\t]+)|([[:space:]]+)|([$/])', null))) and cbp.checked_out_date_time is null and cbp.rejected_date_time is null and cbp.approved_date_time is not null and cbp.cancellation_date_time is null -- crc.description_03 is not null and (cbp.watchlist_ind = 'N' or cbp.watchlist_ind is null) and cbp.zone_code = :zone_code and crc.reference_type = 'CNPT' order by cbp.due_date_time desc
